name: libre-glucose-monitor
description: Real-time glucose monitoring app using Freestyle Libre sensor and Libre LinkUp API

scripts.start:local: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=local react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=development react-scripts start
scripts.start:staging: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=staging react-scripts start
scripts.start:prod: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=production react-scripts start
scripts.start:docker: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_DOCKER=true react-scripts start
scripts.build: (npm run set-version || echo 'Version script failed, continuing...') && react-scripts build
scripts.build:local: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=local react-scripts build

scripts.build:staging: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=staging react-scripts build
scripts.build:prod: npm run set-version && REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=production react-scripts build
